member.name: T:DjK.Utilities.CsvParser
member.summary: Provides a functionality to parse csv file and convert text data to specified data object.

member.name: P:DjK.Utilities.CsvParser.Separators
member.summary: Separators used in csv file. Cannot be empty.
member.exception: Thrown on attempt to assign null reference.
Thrown on attempt to assign an empty array.

member.name: M:DjK.Utilities.CsvParser.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Specify path to csv file. Semicolon (;) will be set as a default separator.

member.name: M:DjK.Utilities.CsvParser.#ctor(System.String,System.Char)
member.summary: Specify path to csv file and a csv separator.

member.name: M:DjK.Utilities.CsvParser.#ctor(System.String,System.Char[])
member.summary: Specify path to csv file and multiple csv separators.

member.name: M:DjK.Utilities.CsvParser.LinesToList``1(System.Func{System.String[],``0})
member.summary: Converts csv line to data object of type T based on provided mapping function. Thrown if the file specified in SourceFile property does not exist.
member.typeparam: Data object to be created from the data in csv file.
member.param: Function mapping csv line to a specified object.
member.returns: List of data objects created from csv data.
member.exception: Thrown if the file specified in the SourceFile property cannot be found.
